item.title: About
item.description: Since I can remember, I’ve always had a deep interest in how things worked. As a kid, I would get in trouble for “breaking” things when I was trying to get to their inner workings. Luckily, my passion for video games and building computers eventually lead me down the path of programming. Some programming languages that I currently work with, or have worked with in the past include Java, Python, Go, Node, JavaScript (TypeScript/CoffeeScript).
